CSGO is one of the original multiplayer first person shooters and by all standards one of the best ever made. The gameplay is the best of the genre in my opinion. The only thing is the cheating  problem which is one we have battled since the game dropped 20 years ago, but has become much more complex and much much worse. We must as a community come together and combat this increasing problem which ruins the game in whole.
